articles.title: NMDC raises iron ore prices again, stock likely to react positively - Moneycontrol
articles.description: On November 23, the company said it has fixed lump ore prices at Rs 5,400 per tonne, from Rs 5,200 per tonne in October. Similarly, it raised prices of fines to Rs 4.660 per tonne from Rs 4,460 per tonne in October
